## PropertyTrack.interpolator property

The primary interpolator for the property components.

- For float/vec2/vec3/vec4/rgb: handles all channels. - For rgba: handles RGB channels only; alpha is handled by `interpolatorAlpha`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get interpolator(): Interpolator;

set interpolator(interpolator: Interpolator);
```
